https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/oAS4UinzyBiyxpIfKVgS1C5JS2L.jpg Binta, a little girl from Senegal, tells us about the everyday life in her village, the importance of education for the girls, and about her father's great idea to make the world a better place. Binta and the Great Idea
